text: mark Wiens here in Honolulu Hawaii the
number one question I get asked is mark
how do you make money how can you afford
to travel around the world and eat so
I'm gonna share that in this upcoming
video and also share how I think you can
do it too
there are hundreds if not thousands of
different ways that you could make money
while you travel I have friends that are
doing everything from working on cruise
ships graphic designers website
designers bloggers on niche subjects
affiliate marketers even people doing
scuba diving and skydiving and making a
living while traveling around the world
you probably see me most of the time
traveling from place to place and eating
delicious feasts but I did not win the
lottery I don't have an endless bank
account and the truth of the matter is
that I do a lot of work when I travel
but I can all do it all from my laptop
online sometimes I work even ten or
twelve or fifteen hours per day writing
video editing I'm just so grateful that
I'm able to do it wherever I am as long
as I have an internet connection and my
laptop also it's worth mentioning that
all of the ways in which I make money
are possible because I started a Travel
food blog back in 2009 and I have
committed and stuck to it okay so let's
go ahead and get started and just so you
know everything I talk about and and
mention in this video will all be listed
below in the description box so be sure
to click below there to get all the
links and more details okay number one
is affiliate marketing on my websites
and what that means is earning a small
percentage of money as a referral so
basically as an example you've seen on
my bangkok travel resources page listed
below I give away a lot of free useful
information about traveling and visiting
Bangkok but also I recommend some hotels
which I personally stayed at and also
which I think are great hotels so if you
were to click on one of those links to
the hotel and then book a hotel I would
get a small percentage of money from
that booking but really it's a win-win
situation because it is my personal
recommendation and you get a great deal
on a hotel
to affiliate marketing is that I only
recommend things that I personally have
used or that I personally trust number
two is by selling my premium travel and
food ebooks and right now I have four
different guides the 101 things to do in
Bangkok the eating Thai food guide the
vegetarian Thai food guide and the Delhi
Travel Guide I prefer to sell my own
products as opposed to doing advertising
because I can guarantee stand behind and
trust the quality of my own guides my
travel guides makes up for one of the
largest percentages of my monthly income
number three is through freelance
writing and freelance projects which is
all possible through the blog before I
started blogging when I was in school I
hated both reading and writing once I
committed myself to writing a blog I
actually figured out that when I when I
wrote about something that I really
enjoyed such as food I actually loved it
so a blog is not only an incredible
resource for sharing ideas and useful
tips and entertainment but it's also a
great way to have a public profile to
show your expertise on a certain subject
through migration LNG com I've had
numerous opportunities to freelance
write for places like CNN travel the
Phuket Gazette many different websites
newspapers and magazines but it was all
a result of having a blog in the first
place one thing I would really urge you
to do if you're interested in making
money while you travel is to start a
blog immediately and it can be about any
kind of subject that you are truly
passionate about and then just commit
yourself to writing and posting articles
that are valuable and useful really high
quality information you will be
surprised at the opportunities that will
arise number four is videos I started
making videos about mid 2011
but I really had no idea what I was
doing then I knew I wanted to start
making videos mainly because photos and
articles are great but videos just bring
a whole add a whole new dimension to
food and so that makes up another part
of my monthly income now you know the
main ways that I make
so let me answer your question one more
time about how I'm able to afford to
travel and eat first of all much of the
money that my wife and I make right now
goes directly back into our traveling
and our eating that being said we don't
own a car we don't have to pay for oil
changes we don't have to pay for gas or
petrol but instead we buy plane tickets
and street food so it's all about
priorities the way that you can earn a
living while you travel is by setting
your own priorities by taking action
towards your goals and I mean actually
accomplishing things doing things and
not just saying you'll do them but
actually getting them done finally
by living intentionally to to accomplish
your goals and to do what you want to do
and also having a blog can really bring
up some opportunities that you never
thought would ever exist at least it has
done for me so thank you very much for
watching this video please give it a
thumbs up and if you have any questions
or comments make sure you leave them
below I'll get back to you and I'll see
you on the next video
